1   package name.pehl.piriti.client.external;
2   
3   import java.util.Date;
4   import java.util.List;
5   
6   import name.pehl.piriti.client.AbstractPiritiTest;
7   
8   /**
9    * @author $Author: harald.pehl $
10   * @version $Date: 2011-03-20 21:02:59 +0100 (So, 20. MÃ¤r 2011) $ $Revision: 295
11   *          $
12   */
13  public abstract class AbstractShopTest extends AbstractPiritiTest
14  {
15      public final static Date _22_11_2010 = new Date(1290380400000l);
16  
17  
18      protected void assertShop(Shop shop)
19      {
20          assertNotNull(shop);
21  
22          // Customer
23          List<Customer> customers = shop.getCustomers();
24          assertNotNull(customers);
25          assertEquals(1, customers.size());
26          Customer customer = customers.iterator().next();
27          assertGarryGourmet(customer);
28  
29          // Products
30          List<Product> products = shop.getProducts();
31          assertNotNull(products);
32          assertEquals(7, products.size());
33          Product product = products.get(0);
34          assertTyhmian(product);
35  
36          // Order
37          Order order = shop.getOrder();
38          assertNotNull(order);
39          assertDate(_22_11_2010, order.getDate());
40          customer = order.getCustomer();
41          assertGarryGourmet(customer);
42          List<OrderItem> items = order.getItems();
43          assertNotNull(items);
44          assertEquals(7, items.size());
45  
46          // OrderItems
47          OrderItem item = items.get(0);
48          assertNotNull(item);
49          assertEquals(1, item.getAmount());
50          product = item.getProduct();
51          assertTyhmian(product);
52      }
53  
54  
55      private void assertGarryGourmet(Customer customer)
56      {
57          assertNotNull(customer);
58          assertEquals("gg", customer.getId());
59          assertEquals("Garry", customer.getFirstname());
60          assertEquals("Gourmet", customer.getSurname());
61      }
62  
63  
64      private void assertTyhmian(Product product)
65      {
66          assertNotNull(product);
67          assertEquals("tym", product.getId());
68          assertEquals("Tyhmian", product.getName());
69          assertEquals(.5, product.getPrice(), .01);
70          assertTrue(product.isAvailable());
71      }
72  }
